tweet: Question... Is saddle soap good for leather furniture. - NO WAY!  pH is way wrong.  Use it on Saddles only, not furniture or car leather.
Reminder...  regularly conditioner your leather with SG - 25.  Get it at http://www.advleather.com
Got a question about leather furniture care?  Check out http://advleather.blogspot.com for a bunch of hits and tips.
Hey friends... If you have leather furniture chk in with me for all the details about care and maintenance - http://advleather.com
Tip of the day...  Never store leather in plastic, it has to breath.  Learn more at http://advleather.com.
